titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the practice of using gas chambers to euthanize stray cats and dogs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Livestock, Rural Development, and Credit.

bill.summary: 12/5/2013--Introduced. Expresses dissatisfaction that the practice of using gas chambers to euthanize stray cats and dogs continues in the United States in the 21st century.
